named-query.name: BC_READ_PRODUCT_IDS_BY_CATEGORY
named-query.query: SELECT categoryProduct.product.id FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.CategoryProductXrefImpl categoryProduct WHERE categoryProduct.category.id IN :categoryIds ORDER BY COALESCE (categoryProduct.displayOrder,999999)

named-query.name: BC_READ_PRODUCT_IDS_BY_CATEGORY_WITH_ORDER
named-query.query: SELECT NEW org.broadleafcommerce.core.search.dao.ProductsByCategoryWithOrder(categoryProduct.product.id, categoryProduct.displayOrder) FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.CategoryProductXrefImpl categoryProduct WHERE categoryProduct.category.id IN :categoryIds ORDER BY COALESCE (categoryProduct.displayOrder,999999)

named-query.name: BC_READ_PARENT_CATEGORY_IDS_BY_PRODUCTS
named-query.query: SELECT NEW org.broadleafcommerce.core.search.dao.ParentCategoryByProduct(categoryProduct.category.id, categoryProduct.product.id, categoryProduct.displayOrder) FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.CategoryProductXrefImpl categoryProduct WHERE categoryProduct.product.id IN :productIds ORDER BY categoryProduct.product.id

named-query.name: BC_READ_PARENT_CATEGORY_IDS_BY_CATEGORIES
named-query.query: SELECT NEW org.broadleafcommerce.core.search.dao.ParentCategoryByCategory(categoryXref.category.id, categoryXref.subCategory.defaultParentCategory.id, categoryXref.subCategory.id) FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.CategoryXrefImpl categoryXref WHERE categoryXref.subCategory.id IN :categoryIds ORDER BY categoryXref.subCategory.id
